blogPost.excerpt: Forky is a mind-mapping tool that is distraction free, with a minimal feature set. • colorful bubble and line diagrams • real-time collaboration • easy and quick to use • no distractions Web app in beta. Mobile coming soon!
blogPost.body: Forky is a mind-mapping tool that is distraction free, with a minimal feature set. • colorful bubble and line diagrams • real-time collaboration • easy and quick to use • no distractions Web app in beta. Mobile coming soon!
blogPost.title: Forky - A minimalistic and distraction-free approach to mind-mapping
blogPost.author: Daniel Sont

localize.description: Forky是一款无分心的思维导图工具，功能极少。- 五彩缤纷的气泡图和线条图--实时协作--简单快捷的使用--不分心 网络应用处于测试阶段。移动版即将推出
localize.tagline: 一种极简和无干扰的思维导图方法。

localize.description: Forky是一款無分心的思維導圖工具，功能極少。- 五彩繽紛的氣泡圖和線條圖--實時協作--簡單快捷的使用--不分心 網絡應用處於測試階段。移動版即將推出
localize.tagline: 一種極簡和無干擾的思維導圖方法。
